definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to hit the nail on the head (idiom)

sentences.english: The motion that the remark of the last speaker be expunged from the record.
sentences.chinese: 該提議要求把最後一個發言的人的講話從記錄上除掉。

sentences.english: I was gratified at the attendance to my talk, and the enthusiastic response.
sentences.chinese: 聽衆對我的發言予以熱烈的響應，令我深感榮幸。

sentences.english: The motion that the remark of the last speaker (should) be expunged from the record.
sentences.chinese: 該提議要求把最後一個發言的人的講話從記錄上除掉。

sentences.english: She did not attend the hearing and was not represented in court.
sentences.chinese: 她沒有出席法院和參加聽證會，也未能向公報發言。

sentences.english: The day after the misinformed spokesman made the announcements he had to take them all back.
sentences.chinese: 發言人誤報消息的次日，他必須撤回所有的消息。

sentences.english: They all clamoured to take the floor.
A spokeswoman for the FTC declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: FTC的一名發言人拒絕置評。

sentences.english: Borsig, through a spokesman, declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 博爾西希通過一位發言人拒絕置評。

sentences.english: No investigation, no right to speak.
sentences.chinese: 沒有調查就沒有發言權。

sentences.english: While there, he plans totake a high-speed train ride from Beijing to Tianjin, said government spokesman Yongyuth Mayalarp said.
sentences.chinese: 他計劃坐高鐵從北京到天津，泰國政府發言人說。

sentences.english: A spokeswoman for Mr. Rajaratnam's legal team declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 拉賈拉特南律師團的一位發言人拒絕置評。

sentences.english: Smart people say dumb stuff when faced with someone else's pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 瀟灑的人說面臨某人懷孕時沒有發言權。

sentences.english: Zoo spokeswoman Durruty said everyone was "absolutely thrilled" at the sextuplets' birth.
sentences.chinese: 動物園女發言人杜魯蒂說大家都被六胞胎驚呆了。

sentences.english: Sun Weide, spokesman for the Beijing Olympic Organizing Committee, has urged that the Games not be politicized.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧組委發言人孫維德呼籲不要將奧運會政治化。

sentences.english: Spokeswomen for Apple and Microsoft declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司和微軟公司的發言人拒絕置評。

sentences.english: Ms Harman fully accepts the court’s judgment, " a spokesperson said.
sentences.chinese: “哈曼女士完全接受法庭的裁判”發言人聲稱。

definition: a speech/to speak/to talk/to address/CL:個|个[ge4]
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
